summary: "Ally McBeal" is an American TV show about a lawyer, Ally (played by Calista Flockhart), working in a Boston law firm. It's more about her love life and personal struggles than court cases. The show was popular and won many awards, including Golden Globes and an Emmy. It aired from 1997 to 2002. There have been talks about bringing it back, but so far, nothing has happened.
title: Ally McBeal
